aboutMe.title: About me
paragraphs: I am a passionate full stack developer, soon to graduate with a BUT in Computer Science specializing in application development. I focus on creating modern and high-performance web applications using technologies such as React and TypeScript.

My background has allowed me to work on various projects, from designing intuitive user interfaces to implementing robust back-end systems. I have solid experience in web application development and am always looking for new challenges to improve my skills.
I am constantly seeking new technologies and methodologies to enhance my skills and stay up to date in this ever-evolving field.
